title: X-Men: the legend of Wolverine [DVD]

description: This DVD contains four colourful animation episodes of the made-for-television series of the "X-men" based on the Marvel comic books of the same name. The episodes all produced and directed by Larry Houston are: "Out of the past, part 1" where X-men discover a space ship underground that contains a great alien force and reunites old lovers (but now foes) of Wolverine with Urico (now cyborg Lady Death-strike); "Out of the past, part 2" where the space ship hull is opened and a evil alien force comes out fighting and captures peoples' spirits with it; "Nightcrawler" where Wolverine ends up in a monastery while fighting an evil beast; "Lotus and the steel" where Wolverine conquers a sword wielding bad guy in Japan and saves the town as well as dealing with his past memories and mind re-programming. Extras include interviews with the creator, Stan Lee and writer, Chris Claremont, from Marvel.
